articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Base x Optimism: Shared Governance and Revenue-Sharing
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Base x OP: Shared Governance, Base Magnate Rugpull, Stable Yield on Base, and more...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Solana Pay x Shopify Solana Pay has integrated its plug-in with Shopify, allowing businesses on its platform to use it for payments. Solana plans to add other altcoins to the platform in the coming months, including SOL and meme token Bonk. EUROe on Solana
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Solana Pay x Shopify, EUROe on Solana, LP as Collateral, and more...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Balancer Pool Vulnerability Balancer has received a report of a critical vulnerability that affects some of its V2 pools. Emergency procedures have been executed and “over 97% of liquidity initially deemed vulnerable is now safe”. ”The vulnerability has not been exploited, however, 0.89% of total TVL ($5.6 million) remains at risk,”. Users are advised to withdraw from Balancer pools.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Balancer Pool Vulnerability, Aave V3 on Base, Confirmation-Free Perps Trading, and more...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Aevo Friend Index Perp Aevo lists FRIEND-PERP, an index perp of Friend Tech. The spot reference is the amount of ETH in the Friend Tech smart contract on Base, converted to dollars at the ETH/USD spot rate, and divided by 1,000,000. Sushi V2 on Base
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Aevo Friend Index Perp, Sushi V2 on Base, Incentivized Lending, and more...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Recap: Week of Aug 14th
articles.title: Last Week in DeFi - Thorchain Lending Live, Sei Mainnet, Exactly Exploit, and More...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Connext Token Launching Bridging protocol Connext will launch its native token NEXT on Sept. 5. On the same day early users will be able to claim their airdrop across Polygon, Arbitrum, Optimism, and Gnosis Chain. Scroll Beta Testnet Live EVM-equivalent ZK-rollup
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Connext Token Launching, Scroll Sepolia Live, Concentrated LPing on Arbitrum, and more...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Funds Stuck on Shibarium The Shibarium L2 mainnet went live today. There seem to be some on-chain issues and transactions are stuck on Shibarium, with $1.8M currently locked on ETH. ThorFi Lending Delayed Thorchain devs recommend delaying the launch of ThorFi lending due to a security patch in the works. Thorchain is using a Binance Tss library with a vulnerability to be patched.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Funds Stuck on Shibarium, ThorFi Lending Delayed, Testnet with Potential Airdrop, and more...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Sei Mainnet Live Sei launches the Pacific-1 mainnet, with bridging and staking enabled. Early airdrop will be claimable later after an ecosystem warmup period. Singapore Stablecoin Rules The Monetary Authority of Singapore (MAS) has finalized the stablecoin
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Sei Mainnet Live, Singapore Stablecoin Rules, Farming on crvUSD, and more...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Arbitrum Odyssey 2.0 The Odyssey 2.0 has launched with open-ended quests and time-limited quests. All scheduled quest lines are over the span of roughly three months. Immutable zkEVM Testnet Live Immutable zkEVM testnet is live. It is an EVM-compatible zk-rollup L2 dedicated to gaming products.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Arbitrum Odyssey 2.0, Immutable zkEVM Testnet, Diva Operator Testnet, and more...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Recap: Week of Aug 7th
articles.title: Last Week in DeFi - Base Launches Onchain Summer, Projects Wind Down, SEC Delays Bitcoin ETF, and More...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: PancakeSwap on Arbitrum BnB Chain-based DEX PancakeSwap is now live on Arbitrum with Swaps, Liquidity Provision, and upcoming Farms and IFOs. Sentiment Sunsetting V1 Sentiment V1 will sunset on Aug 22nd, while the team is working on the upcoming V2. Previously, Sentiment was affected by the Cruve exploit and had deprecated support for Convex/Curve TriCrypto pools.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - PancakeSwap on Arbitrum, Sentiment Sunsetting V1, Stable Pools with Boost, and more...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Base Mainnet Live Base mainnet is now open to the public, with 100+ dApps available. The Base team launches the Onchain Summer campaign, encouraging engagement with daily NFT mints. SpiritSwap Winding Down Fantom-based DEX SpiritSwap is looking for a team to hand things to. If no team is going to take over, the project will stop operations on 9/1.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Base Mainnet Live, SpiritSwap Winding Down, Angle Launches V2, and more...

articles.description: Saddle to Close Down Curve fork protocol Saddle plans to wind down the protocol and airdrop protocol-owned $ARB tokens to $SDL/veSDL holders. Goldfinch Faces Loan Default RWA protocol Goldfinch has defaulted on a $5m loan to Kenyan motorcycle company Tugende. Tugende reportedly breached the terms of the loan agreement, resulting in a default amounting to approximately 4% of Goldfinch's TVL.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Saddle to Close Down, Goldfinch Faces Loan Default, Upgraded Perps Trading, and more...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Uniswap on Base Uniswap is now live on Base. Aevo Telegram Bot Aevo launches a Telegram trading bot, allowing users to trade perps, monitor positions, and manage accounts on Aevo directly from Telegram. Compared to other telegram bots, users only need to submit api keys, making this theoretically more secure.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Uniswap on Base, Aevo Telegram Bot, PayPal PYUSD, and more...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Recap: Week of July 31st
articles.title: Last Week in DeFi - CRV Hacker Returns Funds, Base Mainnet Soon, MakerDAO Enhanced DSR, and More...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: GMX V2 Live GMX launches v2 beta on Arbitrum and Avalanche. The upgrade enables new markets, multiple collateral types, improved UX, low-fee swaps for traders, and new incentives for LPs. Base Bridge Live, Mainnet Soon Base L2 is now open for bridging
articles.title: Today in DeFi - GMX V2 Live, Base Bridge Live, Fixed-Rate Lending via Auctions… , and more...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: ETH Futures ETFs Filed Six firms (Volatility Shares, Bitwise, VanEck, Roundhill, ProShares, and Grayscale) have filed applications with the SEC for ETH Futures ETFs. The first ETH futures ETF could go live on Oct. 12, if the SEC does not deny the application.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - ETH Future ETFs Incoming, Abracadabra Retracts Rate Change, Fixed-Rate Lending on OP, and more...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Term Finance Live Term Finance, a fixed-rate lending protocol, is live on Ethereum. Term uses a recurring auction process to provide certainty to borrowers and lenders. SEC Sues Richard Heart The SEC sues Richard Heart, and his projects Hex, PulseChain, and PulseX, alleging he raised over $1B across three different unregistered securities offerings beginning in 2019.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Term Finance Live, SEC Charges Richard Heart, USDt Incentives, and more...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: US IRS to Tax Staking Rewards The US Internal Revenue Service (IRS) issued a ruling on Monday saying that "given rewards for validation activity on a PoS network should count the rewards as income in the year the investor gets control of those tokens".
articles.title: Today in DeFi - US IRS to Tax Staking Rewards, Rugpull & Exploit on Base pre-launch, NFT Farming on Solana, and more...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Recap: Week of July 24th
articles.title: Last Week in DeFi - Curve Stablepool Exploits, US Advances Crypto Regulation, Arbitrum Odyssey Returning, and More...
